Package de.affect.manage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffectManager
    The class AffectManager stores all necessary data for the affect computation of virtual characters.
    AffectOutputCreater  
    AppraisalManager
    The class AppraisalManager contains methods for appraising relevant input for affect generation.
    AppraisalRuleReader
    The class AppraisalRuleReader provides a method that reads all appraisal rules defined by a Appraisal element node This code relys on the xml bean classes created with xmlbeans v1.3 from the Affect.xsd schema, which is part of this distribution.
    AppraisalRules
    The class AppraisalRules holds all appraisal rules of one entity.
    CharacterManager
    The class CharacterManager stores all necessary data and provides emotion and mood computation functions.
    DocumentManager  
    GroupManager
    The class GroupManager stores all necessary data and provides emotion and mood computation functions for a group of characters.
